items.title: Erasmus scheme to return for UK students
items.description: The UK ended its participation in the scheme in 2020 after agreeing a Brexit deal with the EU.

items.title: Fifa announces small number of £45 World Cup tickets after criticism of prices
items.description: Fifa introduces a small number of "more affordable" $60 (£45) tickets for all 104 matches at the 2026 World Cup following criticism of its pricing str...

items.title: Fifa introduces some £45 World Cup tickets after backlash
items.description: Fifa introduces a small number of "more affordable" $60 (£45) tickets for all 104 matches at the 2026 World Cup following criticism of its pricing str...

items.title: Watch: Timeline of Paul Doyle's journey to parade
items.description: Doyle, who admitted 31 offences, was sentenced to 21 years and six months in prison.

items.title: Second doctor sentenced in Matthew Perry overdose death
items.description: Dr Mark Chavez, one of five people who pleaded guilty in the Friends star's death, was sentenced to eight months of home detention.
